actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress concerning the desirability of locating Federal Government trade-related activities in the Harlem International Trade Center in the city of New York, New York.

summary.text: Urges the Federal Government to give priority consideration to locating additional Federal facilities north of 96th Street in Manhattan, New York, and, specifically, Federal trade development activities in the Harlem International Trade Center, New York.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress concerning the desirability of locating Federal Government trade-related activities in the Harlem International Trade Center in the city of New York, New York.
